widget.header: Let’s Find Out What’s Been Achieved So Far by Our Teams at Justia

description: Justia Amplify Review Tool: This platform adds value to our Justia Amplify product by providing our clients with a centralized, professional looking page to ask for client reviews. (Note this hasn't been shared publicly yet as of 2020-09-15)
GMB Media Downloads: We have yet more added value to our Justia Amplify service. We can now make a copy of all media resources in a GMB listing to produce even better LSA pages.
State Regulations: We published the regulation codes for all 50 states. It was a joint effort between Justia and Carl Malamud, who collected and provided us with the dataset.

Internal Tools Updates: Our teams improve and update our workflows and protocols on an ongoing basis. As such, we are excited about the most recent improvement, a neat Slack integration. The integration will allow anyone to create meeting minutes instantly. We are pretty sure this will be beneficial to maintain better communication and save time. Very soon, we will be sharing this feature with everyone in the company.
